Columns in the latest tiltOutput

Source: R/cols.R
cols_all.Rd

Columns in the latest tiltOutput

Usage

cols_all()

cols_product_all()

cols_product_emission()

cols_product_sector()

cols_product_transition_risk()

cols_company_all()

cols_company_sector()

cols_company_emission()

cols_company_transition_risk()

Value

Character.

Examples

cols_all()
#> [1] "companies_id" "company_name" "country"     

cols_product_all()
#>  [1] "companies_id"              "company_name"             
#>  [3] "country"                   "matched_activity_name"    
#>  [5] "matched_reference_product" "matching_certainty"       
#>  [7] "product"                   "unit"                     
#>  [9] "tilt_sector"               "tilt_subsector"           
#> [11] "isic_4digit"               "main_activity"            

cols_product_emission()
#>  [1] "companies_id"              "company_name"             
#>  [3] "country"                   "matched_activity_name"    
#>  [5] "matched_reference_product" "matching_certainty"       
#>  [7] "product"                   "unit"                     
#>  [9] "tilt_sector"               "tilt_subsector"           
#> [11] "isic_4digit"               "main_activity"            
#> [13] "emission_category"         "emission_rank"            
#> [15] "grouping_emission"         "co2_footprint"            

cols_product_sector()
#>  [1] "companies_id"              "company_name"             
#>  [3] "country"                   "matched_activity_name"    
#>  [5] "matched_reference_product" "matching_certainty"       
#>  [7] "product"                   "unit"                     
#>  [9] "tilt_sector"               "tilt_subsector"           
#> [11] "isic_4digit"               "main_activity"            
#> [13] "sector_category"           "sector_target"            
#> [15] "scenario"                  "year"                     

cols_product_transition_risk()
#>  [1] "companies_id"              "company_name"             
#>  [3] "country"                   "matched_activity_name"    
#>  [5] "matched_reference_product" "matching_certainty"       
#>  [7] "product"                   "unit"                     
#>  [9] "tilt_sector"               "tilt_subsector"           
#> [11] "isic_4digit"               "main_activity"            
#> [13] "transition_risk_category"  "transition_risk_score"    
#> [15] "grouping_transition_risk" 

cols_company_all()
#> [1] "companies_id"  "company_name"  "country"       "postcode"     
#> [5] "address"       "main_activity" "min_headcount" "max_headcount"

cols_company_sector()
#>  [1] "companies_id"                   "company_name"                  
#>  [3] "country"                        "postcode"                      
#>  [5] "address"                        "main_activity"                 
#>  [7] "min_headcount"                  "max_headcount"                 
#>  [9] "sector_target_avg_equal_weight" "sector_target_avg_best_case"   
#> [11] "sector_target_avg_worst_case"   "sector_target_NA_share"        
#> [13] "scenario"                       "year"                          

cols_company_emission()
#>  [1] "companies_id"                   "company_name"                  
#>  [3] "country"                        "postcode"                      
#>  [5] "address"                        "main_activity"                 
#>  [7] "min_headcount"                  "max_headcount"                 
#>  [9] "emission_rank_avg_equal_weight" "emission_rank_avg_best_case"   
#> [11] "emission_rank_avg_worst_case"   "emission_rank_NA_share"        
#> [13] "grouping_emission"              "co2e_avg"                      

cols_company_transition_risk()
#>  [1] "companies_id"                     "company_name"                    
#>  [3] "country"                          "postcode"                        
#>  [5] "address"                          "main_activity"                   
#>  [7] "min_headcount"                    "max_headcount"                   
#>  [9] "grouping_transition_risk"         "avg_transition_risk_equal_weight"
#> [11] "avg_transition_risk_best_case"    "avg_transition_risk_worst_case"  
#> [13] "transition_risk_NA_share"
